jd: From: Lakshmi, Unify Solutions lakshmi@unifysolutions.com Reply to: lakshmi@unifysolutions.com MUST HAVE: * Azure Data Factory - Data flow* Azure Notebooks, Data bricks, * NoSQL (MongoDB/Cosmos D)* Power BI Functional Responsibilities: · Must have at least 10 + years. Of Exp. in Designing & Architecting the Data Applications on Premises & Cloud. · Azure Data Architect with having solid understanding of design Principles of Database Architecture and business strategies using Azure Cloud Data Ecosystem. · Maintain the governance model on the database architecture through training, design reviews, code reviews, and progress reviews. · Participate in the development of Database Architecture and Roadmaps in support of business strategies · Determine how the enterprise’s data will be stored and utilized to best provide actionable data to the end user · Work with internal and external resources to develop robust Extract/Transform/Load (ETL) processes for disparate data sources
